channel.title: CVE Feed for The Wireshark Foundation -- Wireshark
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Wireshark Foundation -- Wireshark

item.title: CVE-2021-22173|2024-08-03T18:37:17.473Z -- the%20wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Memory leak in USB HID dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.2 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2021-22235|2024-08-03T18:37:18.219Z -- the%20wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Crash in DNP dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.6 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.14 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2021-22222|2024-08-03T18:37:18.527Z -- the%20wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Infinite loop in DVB-S2-BB dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.5 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2021-22174|2024-08-03T18:37:17.907Z -- the%20wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Crash in USB HID dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.2 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.title: CVE-2021-22191|2024-08-03T18:37:18.230Z -- the%20wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Improper URL handling in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.3 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.11 could allow remote code execution via via packet injection or crafted capture file.

item.title: CVE-2021-22207|2024-08-03T18:37:18.330Z -- the%20wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Excessive memory consumption in MS-WSP dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.4 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.12 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
